title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Friday, 19 February 2016 - BBC News
summary: four polish lorry drivers plead guilty to an immigration offence following the discovery of 68 suspected illegal immigrants .
six-foot ( 1.8m ) sinkhole closes road to traffic in clacton .
conservative mp for colchester , will quince , says he 'll be voting for britain to leave the european union .
plans for a large retail and leisure park near colchester have been rejected .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: updates for essex live have finished for this week - thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back on monday morning from 08:00 with the latest news for the county .
have a great weekend .

documents.title: lorry driver admits charge over cyclist death
text: an essex lorry driver has admitted killing a cyclist who died in an accident at a busy junction in central london .
french-born mother-of-two claire hitier-abadie , 36 , collided with the construction vehicle during the morning rush-hour in victoria on february 19 last year .
alan warwick , 61 , of rayleigh , essex , pleaded guilty to causing death by careless driving at southwark crown court .

documents.title: weather : patchy rain clearing overnight
text: cloudy with patchy rain at times this evening , but this will gradually ease overnight with a few clear intervals developing later .
staying breezy , but much milder than last night with temperatures only falling to 5c ( 41f ) .
saturday will start dry and perhaps bright , but it will be rather cloudy for much of the day .
temperatures reaching as high as 12c ( 54f ) .
author: Dan Holley
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: colchester to resettle 50 more syrian families over next four to five years
text: colchester is to welcome 50 more families of syrian war refugees .
author: Daily Gazette

documents.title: football : braintree sign millwall goalkeeper tom king
text: national league side braintree town have signed millwall goalkeeper tom king on a 28-day emergency loan .
the 20-year-old ex-england under-17 player joined the lions after he left crystal palace in the summer of 2014 .
king spent time on loan at braintree 's national league rivals welling earlier this season , making 20 appearances .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: your rayleigh windmill on a winter 's afternoon
text: thanks to bbc weather watcher , youcantbecirrus , who sent us this photo of rayleigh windmill earlier today .
the 68ft ( 20.7m ) grade ii listed tower mill , built about 1809 , is the highest in essex .
if you 'd like to find out more about becoming a bbc weather watcher - click here .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: snooker : ronnie o'sullivan into welsh open semi-finals
text: chigwell 's ronnie o'sullivan is into the welsh open snooker semi-finals .
the essex player beat mark selby 5-1 in cardiff a short while ago .
he will play for a place in the final tomorrow against either joe perry or ben woollaston .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: headlines : lorry drivers admit immigration offence dumped puppy found locked in cage
text: here are the latest stories from the essex newsroom :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: clacton 's gilbey family back on the gogglebox
text: linda , pete and george gilbey , from clacton , are returning to channel 4 's gogglebox tonight .
the family were removed from the show when george ( centre ) signed up for celebrity big brother in 2014 , breaking their contract .
the news comes as we learned that george is going to be a dad .
in a recent interview with heat magazine he told them : `` i feel like the cat that got the cream '' .
author: BBC Newsbeat

documents.title: three teenage boys robbed of bikes by 'armed ' men
text: three teenagers were robbed of their bikes in colchester after being threatened with what is believed to have been a gun , police say .
the boys , two aged 15 and a 16-year-old , were targeted by three men in flagstaff road at about 20:25 on tuesday .
the suspects rode off towards abbey fields after the three bicycles were handed over .
nobody is believed to have been injured .

documents.title: ronnie o'sullivan plays in welsh open snooker quarter-finals
text: chigwell 's ronnie o'sullivan is currently in action in the welsh open snooker quarter-finals .
he is taking on mark selby in the best of nine frames match - you can watch ronnie in action here .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: chelmsford car park cleared of unauthorised traveller encampment
text: an unauthorised traveller encampment that occupied a car park in chelmsford for nearly a month has been cleared .
the wharf road long stay car park had been closed while chelmsford city council seeked a possession order to evict about seven caravans .
pc alan conran from essex police tweeted the travellers had moved on following a `` peaceful resolution '' .
the local authority says a `` comprehensive clean-up '' is now under way .

documents.title: harwich immigrants : home office 'pleased ' with polish lorry drivers ' admission
text: the home office says it 's `` pleased '' four polish lorry drivers have admitted immigration offences following the discovery of 68 suspected illegal immigrants at harwich port last year .

dariusz mokrogulski , 45 , dariusz drozdz , 40 , grzegoez czechowski , 39 , and radoslaw cwikla , 39 , pleaded guilty to conspiring to facilitate illegal entry of non-eu citizens into the uk during a hearing at chelmsford crown court .
people smuggling is a vile trade and as this investigation demonstrates we are determined to bring those responsible to justice '' , a home office spokeswoman said .

documents.title: basildon one stop shop robbed in armed raid
text: armed robbers have raided a basildon shop and stole cash after threatening staff with a hand gun , police say .
the one stop store in marsh view court was targeted by two men at about 22:50 last night .
the shop worker was not injured but has been left shaken after the incident .
the suspects are both described as about 5ft 9in ( 1.75m ) tall and wearing dark clothing , scarves and white gardening gloves .

documents.title: clacton street remains closed after sinkhole appears
text: wellesley road in clacton-on-sea remains closed this afternoon after 6ft ( 1.8m ) deep sinkhole appeared earlier .
essex county council says maintenance crews are working to fix the problem .
you can stay up-to-date with the latest travel for essex here .

documents.title: lorry drivers plead guilty over 68 immigrants found at harwich port
text: four lorry drivers have pleaded guilty to an immigration offence after 68 suspected illegal immigrants were found inside lorries at harwich port last year .
the polish men each admitted one offence of conspiring to facilitate illegal entry of non-eu citizens into the uk at chelmsford crown court today .
dariusz mokrogulski , 45 , dariusz drozdz , 40 , grzegoez czechowski , 39 , and radoslaw cwikla , 39 , have been bailed and are due to be sentenced next month .

documents.title: football : southend united look to resign stephen hendrie on loan
text: southend united manager phil brown says he 's in talks to bring defender stephen hendrie back to the club on loan .
the west ham united player has been with the blues for the last month , but his loan deal expired on tuesday .
`` i 'm in talks to extend the loan , whether that 's a possibility to start again on monday we 'll have to wait and see '' , brown said .
author: Victoria Polley
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: weather : cloudy with patchy rain this afternoon
text: there may be some sunny spells to begin with this afternoon though skies will cloud over with patchy light rain arriving later .
the winds will also strengthen through the day , making it feel that bit cooler by the late afternoon .
maximum temperature : 9c ( 48f ) .
thanks to bbc weather watcher , steve b , who took this great photo in tilbury earlier today .
his `` nowcast '' reported sunshine with temperatures at about 1c ( 33.8f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: lunchtime headlines : lorry drivers plead guilty to immigration offence sinkhole closes clacton road
text: here are your top stories for essex this lunchtime :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: puppy covered in excrement found dumped in cage
text: a 12-week-old puppy has been dumped in the garden of a stranger in boreham , the rspca says .
the husky-german shepherd cross , who has since been named willow , was found covered in excrement inside a cage measuring 2ft ( 0.6m ) by 3ft ( 0.9m ) on wednesday .
the rspca said : `` she is a lovely girl and just wants cuddles all the time .
we hope someone might come forward who recognises her or who knows why she was left in this garden . ''

documents.title: fire destroys 5,000 tonnes of hay in great baddow
text: this was the scene in great baddow last night as firefighters tackled a blaze involving 5,000 tonnes of hay .
essex fire and rescue was called to the fire in a field on generals lane at about 00:45 this morning .
it was highly visible to drivers on the nearby a12 .
crews remained at the scene throughout the morning .

documents.title: man found with head injuries in southend street
text: a man has been found with serious head injuries in a street in southend .
essex police says the victim , who is believed to be in his 40s , was discovered in tylers avenue in the early hours of this morning .
he is now being treated in hospital in london where his condition is described as `` serious '' .

documents.title: clacton street sinkhole estimated at about 6ft ( 1.8m ) deep
text: this is the sinkhole that has closed wellesley road in clacton .
we understand the hole has opened up because the material under the road has been washed away due to a leaking sewer .
an essex county council engineer who inspected the site estimated the hole to be about 6ft ( 1.8m ) deep .

documents.title: will quince 's vote to leave eu announcement 'quite surprising '
text: i was quite surprised when colchester mp will quince announced on bbc essex this morning that he would vote for britain to leave the european union .
the conservative has been quite considered when looking at the eu , and in some ways he has bolted out of the stable before david cameron is even on back on the eurostar .
he joins the likes of bernard jenkin and james cleverly who are essex conservative mps also backing for britain to leave the eu .
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: essex takes a trip to cameron close to gauge eu support
text: i 've been speaking to neighbours in cameron close , leigh-on-sea , in an unscientific attempt by bbc essex to gauge support for david cameron 's eu negotiations .
graham ( britain should stay in europe and was the first person in the close to express support for britain 's eu membership , while clive believes brexit is best .
two households have come out strongly against - several others are undecided as they follow the talks in brussels .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: clacton sinkhole closes busy road
text: we 're currently trying to establish more information about a sinkhole that has closed wellesley road in clacton .
the opening is said to be 6ft ( 1.8m ) deep and about 15ft ( 4.5m ) long , closing the road between alexandra road and pier avenue in both directions .
our reporter is currently travelling to the scene .

documents.title: deal for extra c2c carriages falls through
text: rail operator c2c has failed in initial discussions to lease extra carriages and ease overcrowding .
author: Southend Echo

documents.title: travel : sinkhole closes clacton street
text: a sinkhole has closed wellesley road in clacton .
we 're trying to find out some more information and will bring you more as we get it
are you at the sinkole site ?
email or tweet us your if it 's safe to do so .
clacton , wellesley rd closed from alexandra rd to pier ave in both directions due to a large sink hole appearing measuring 2 x 6 x15ft

documents.title: douglas carswell calls colchester mp a 'hero ' for brexit announcement
text: the ukip mp for clacton , douglas carswell , has called colchester mp will quince a `` hero '' after the conservative told bbc essex he would vote for britain to leave the eu .
breaking news with @ twitterid this morning as colchester mp @ twitterid says he will vote to leave the eu .
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid will quince is a very great man !
hero
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid we british want british not brussels rule , # vote leave
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: kevin keen remains confident despite colchester 's league predicament
text: colchester united manager kevin keen has told me he is confident the team can turn their troubled season around .
the u 's are currently bottom of their division , without a league one victory since october last year .
they travel to bury tomorrow .
author: Victoria Polley
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: weather : bright and dry initially , cloud and rain arriving late afternoon
text: after a frosty and perhaps foggy start , it will be dry this morning with plenty of sunshine around .
through the afternoon , the skies will cloud over , with patchy light rain arriving later .
maximum temperature : 9c ( 48f ) .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: colchester mp , will quince , will vote for britain to leave the eu
text: the mp for colchester , will quince , has exclusively told bbc essex he 'll be voting for britain to leave the european union .
the conservative has previously been undecided on the issue but says he has made his mind up in the last 24 hours .
`` i was optimistic these renegotiations could reset our relations with the eu and make it suitable for the 21st century , but i do n't think that can be and has been achieved '' , mr quince said .
author: Rob Jelly
BBC Essex

documents.title: headlines : colchester mp will vote to leave eu plans for tollgate village rejected
text: here are the top stories for essex this morning :
author: Sonia Watson
BBC Essex

documents.title: welcome to friday 's essex live page
text: hello !
welcome to friday 's live page for essex .
until 18:00 we 'll be bringing you all the latest news for the county .
if you 'd like to say hello you can email us , send us a tweet or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
